tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningData (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_date DATE NOT NULL,
    eye_side VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    scan_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    disease_progression VARCHAR(100) NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningData (
    scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    scan_date DATE,
    scan_result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EyeHealthTrends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    trend_date DATE,
    trend_analysis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningData (
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  scan_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  scan_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, scan_date)
)

CREATE TABLE EyeHealthTrends (
  trend_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  trend_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseProgression (
  disease_id INT NOT NULL,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  progression_date DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (disease_id)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthHistory (
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  history_date DATE NOT NULL,
  health_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, history_date)
)

CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningResults (
    patient_id INT,
    scan_date DATE,
    scan_result varchar(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, scan_date)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientInformation (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name varchar(255),
    age INT,
    gender varchar(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseProgression (
    patient_id INT,
    disease_name varchar(255),
    stage INT,
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, disease_name)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthTrends (
    trend_id INT,
    trend_name varchar(255),
    observation_date DATE,
    observation_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
)

CREATE TABLE EyeHealthRecords (
    record_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    scan_date DATE,
    health_condition varchar(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (record_id)
)
